subject: College Athletics
Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: Illinois guard Jeff Jordan has earned a limited role on an N.C.A.A. tournament team, as well as the one thing he always wanted most — a sense of normalcy.
snippet: Illinois guard Jeff Jordan has earned a limited role on an N.C.A.A. tournament team, as well as the one thing he always wanted most — a sense of normalcy.
